thread.section_title: Goldcar opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Goldcar | www.goldcar.com | 5 de 675
thread.title: Rebecca

author: Rebecca
title: Rebecca
text: I was very dubious to book with Goldcar as I had read terrible reviews, from a few years ago. I booked with Goldcar as they seemed reasonable price and my father in law had recommend them. I paid for the SuperRelaxed cover, which is slightly more expensive, but definitely worth it. I collected it from Murcia airport, and all I had to do was collect the keys. The staff were helpful and friendly, and picking up the car and dropping it off was a breeze. Car was in great condition. I opted for Fuel for Fuel, so I just filled up the tank before dropping it off, this is the best option so you don't get ripped off. I would 100% recommend using Goldcar to my friends and family.
